name: Weird Cell Evolution Clicker Game
description:
Just some clicker game I've been working on when i'm free from my main project. This game is very early in development right now there're just 4 stage of evolution but i've alot of plan on this game much much more evolution and game mechanics. If you somehow try this game out please leave feedback for me it means so much for newbie developer like me. Thank you so much!

Control

Left Click - Produce cell and upgrade cell and destroy enemy cell.

Right Click - Move your origin cell that produce cell.

How to play

Produce cell as much as you can. Upgrade cell to produce even more cell. Protect your specie from enemy cell to evolve your specie to the next stage of evolution what will they become who knows(even developer of this game doesn't  know).

*THIS GAME HAS NO SAVE SYSTEM YET*

New update

-Add level cap that unlock through specie evolution to balance game
